Function register_test_unit

boost::unit_test::framework::register_test_unit — This function add new test case into the global collection of test units the framework aware of.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/test/framework.hpp>


void register_test_unit(test_case * tc);

Description

This function also assignes unique test unit id for every test case. Later on one can use this id to locate the test case if necessary. This is the way for the framework to maintain weak references between test units.

Parameters:

tc

test case to register
